projects.name: Checkmark
projects.intro: Decision quality assurance system for the Planning Inspectorate
projects.brief:
United all quality assurance functions across the Planning Inspectorate, providing users with a self-service system
Reduced admin overhead and process duration – saving around 500 weeks from overall case age in pilot phase alone
Increased scope of data captured and data quality (reduce likelihood of data errors)
projects.execution:
Three apps built within Microsoft Power Apps – covering decision submission, decision review, and process administration
Integrated solution comprising 6 SharePoint lists/libraries and 19 Power Automate flows
Row-based security on all items and linked documents
Manger-report relationship management
Online document access and editing
In-line comment history
Integrated help pages with accordion-style layout
Around 2,000 app versions in total (1+ year in development)
38-page solution design (plus embedded documents, including comprehensive business logic, architecture and workflow diagrams, and field mapping/data dictionary)

projects.name: Thump a Trump
projects.execution: First team project, Over delivered on requirements.
